Projects:

Article Sentiment Comprehension (ASC)

Given a webpage's url, the program parses its contents, identifies its sentiment bias (negative, positive, neutral), and summarizes its key points and their associated tone.

Twitter (X) Bot Identifier

An X bot which sampled random instances of activity, determined if the associated accounts were bots, and created a confidence interval to approximate the true proportion of active users on X that are bots.

Dartboard Investing

A modified electric dartboard (using a Raspberry Pi 4) where stocks were able to be to be chosen by random dart throws. Used the Alpaca Trade API to automatically verify, assess, and invest in the associated stocks - 40 percent growth over a 6 month time frame

Personal Website

A React-based website which hosts general information about me while also being a fully-interactive desktop inspired by early Mac desktop aesthetics. Files opened, closed, moved around (along with their windows), and there are multiple classic games to play.
: null ) } export default ProjectsFile;
